abilities.name: Blood Frenzy.
abilities.description: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness.
abilities.description: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

abilities.name: Shark Telepathy.
abilities.description: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The sahuagin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): guidance, thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): bless, detect magic, guiding bolt
* 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (trident)
* 3rd level (3 slots): mass healing word, tongues
